TopicTitle: Is a Falcon heavy launch/recovery possible?

Articles.Content:
So I have been tryin to figure this out without using a mod like stage recovery and I can’t seem to get it right I was hoping to be able to do it like Marcus house dose in his videos 

Thanks!

Yes, there are several players who recorded and posted videos of Falcon Heavy Launch/Recovery scenarios. However, at least one mod is necessary -- a mod to allow focus switching in atmosphere (and, of course, a camera mod, AFAIK).

I think the only way to do it pure stock would be to get every piece but one orbital, then bring everything down one at a time.... so not really like it is.

You could use this.  It's similar to stage recovery, but you still have to do all the work.  Just not all at once. 

 

Edited October 15, 2018 by Geonovast
